item.title: Offline OCR System
item.description: This project demonstrates Youdao’s Offline OCR System, including image stitching, text detection and recognition. It has been successfully deployed on Youdao DictPen Series, and has been used by more than 1 million users.

item.title: Offline Inference Engine
item.description: This project shows Youdao’s Offline Inference Engine, which deploys deep models on various devices using self-developed controller based on open source frameworks. It has successfully run on all Youdao’s smart hardware, like the Youdao DictPen Series, Youdao SuperDict and Youdao Translator.

item.title: Finger Point Reading Solution
item.description: This project shows Youdao’s pioneering Finger Point Reading Solution, which has filled the gap between gesture interaction and learning applications, like word search, translation and question search. It has been run on Youdao AI Cloud and BBK Pad S5.

item.title: Font Retrieval and OCR System
item.description: This project showcases two projects during my internship in Aliyun.
